Key:
Awww, darling! Hurry up and come! Let's go
do something fun.

Do not let her entice you, Shido. We Yamai
sisters will take good care of you.

Searching. There is a delicious cake shop near
here, Shido. We will take you there.

What, cake shop?! That's a great idea, Shido.
Let us go to the cake shop together.

Shido doesn't like to snack. So you should go
shopping with me.
Damn... What can I do to settle things down...

Oh, it's Itsuka-kun～ He's playing around with
girls again.

Gosh, and in a public place too... He sure lacks
a sense of propriety!
Seriously, what a turn off.

Wow, if it isn't Yamabuki, Hazakura, and
Fujibakama! The trio that likes to show up,
make their comments, and leave.

Hey, can you not treat us like some kind of
audience of yours?

Just because you're popular, you think you're
all that.
What a turn off.

(They're going to see this situation and
eventually spread crazy rumors throughout
the school.)

However! I'm going to turn
this into an opportunity!

Hey Yamabuki, Hazakura, Fujibakama! I...
suddenly am really interested in you guys!
All right, let's hang out!
...What?
...Excuse me?!
What a turn off.

Come on, it shouldn't be bad to hang out from
time to time, right? We're classmates, so we
should be friends...
O-Oh, I just remembered I had to run errands!
Ahhh, Mother!
S-Seriously, what a turn off!
Heh... I guess this is the sin of my charms...
Wh-What the...? Shido, what's gotten into you?
Assumption. Maybe he ate something funny.

Shido has acted like this in the past. I don't
find it odd.
Hm... You're not your usual self, Shido...
But I think this side of you is cool, darling.

Okay... So the trio is gone and everyone else
is dumbfounded... So I should just...
(And that is how I escaped from everyone.)
